_sText:
Well the new Version of my map, the full changelog is included in the zip, but i post it here too :P zm_fortress_b5 - Changelog

zm_fortress_b5 - Changelog

Created by [#OMEGA] - K2

Preface:

This is my first offical multiplayer map; I deceided to create a zombie mod because zombie mod owns. Orginally it was crated for a clan out of a HLÂ² Map (which was created just for SP ^^), but this clan kicked me so I won't work for the clan anymore. This map is independent now ^^

Map Information:

This is somekind of a fortress build by humans and overtaken by the combines during the war. Now it is abonded and the combine and thair human slaves disappeared without a trace. Blood and somekind of "Headcrabs" were found here; according to roumors zombies were seen in the fortress...
Now it's about you to find out what really happened here...
Good Luck soldier!

Version Info:
Version: Beta 5
Released: 21.06.2007 (June)
Spawnpoints: 32 T, 32 CT (64 Total)
Notes: NO HDR, not all rooms finished yet; nav and txt file bspzipped
Compiling Time: vbsp.exe 33s.
vvis.exe 8h 11 min. 44s
vrad.exe 13 min. 10s
Total: 8h 25min 27s
Contact @ (no spam):

Email: omegak2@gmx.de
ICQ: 192-355-651
MSN: omegak2@hotmail.de

Changelog:
  • changelog and zm_fortress_b5.txt changed and updated ;D
  • fixed the nodraw textures in the bathroom
  • changed the fornt texture of the weapon racks in the secret room
  • removed the end fade dist of some props due to some problems :/
  • made the windows in the room near CT spawn breakable
  • created bombzones for time correction
  • fixed a bug due to many people called it "bug" - the entrance to the K2 room
  • added a ladder in the big vent
  • replaced a illusionary with a vent entrance
  • removed a picture due to a lightnig bug
  • made the vents leading into the K2 Room bigger
  • removed the pusheffect in the K2 vents
  • added 2 new areas including a sewer - explore yourself ;D
  • 2 new secret spots ;P
  • added some pylons with a rope in the tunnel between ct and t spawn
  • finshed the remaining room near CT spawn
  • added something that should protect the map from being uncompiled
  • fixed visgroups/added missing props into visgroups (editor only)
  • removed a unnecessary Vendingmachine
  • corrected the postion of a prop in the bathroom
  • added another way to the vent outside due to balancing
  • added another way into the kitchen due to balancing
  • added ammo to the weapons; 1000 for normal weapons and 128 for shotguns
  • fixed the logos; replaced some faces with nodraw textures
  • finished the small guardhouse
  • added starup cam view points
  • replaced some faces textures with nodraw
  • some cubemaps were optimised
  • removed some props in the storages (useless ones)
  • added a new campspot near a window..
  • added more decals
  • added End Fade Dists for the all lightprops
  • added End Fade Dists for misc props and the ladders
  • rewritten this file in html :)
  • Nav and txt File were included in the .bsp file
Some Props in the following room were replaced with prop_physics or prop_physics_multiplayer (where possible):
  • Kitchen
  • Office Storage
  • Office
  • Supervison Room
  • Bathroom
  • Old Room
  • Entrance Room
Planned for new Versions:
  • finishing the remaining Rooms
  • adding some more props
  • different Button position (secret buttons) [Final]
  • [decals (maybe more)]
  • [Sounds (maybe more)]
  • (HDRR)
  • maybe some more optimising / areaportals, etc.
  • overview/radar
Always planned:
  • bugfixes (If I find some or someone report bugs)
  • balancing
Installation:

Just do the following steps to install the map:

  • copy the file "zm_fortress_b5.bsp" into your ..\cstrike\maps\ folder
  • add the map to your mapcycle.txt/maplist.txt/votemaplist.txt
  • if you are using sv_downloadurl upload the file to your ftp too
  • you should compress the map files with bz2 for faster download if you are using sv_downloadurl ;)
Zip-File should contain:
zm_fortress_b5.bsp 10.035.852 Bytes
zm_fortress_b5 - changelog - information.html x Bytes

If one of these files is missing please redownload the map; i offically uploaded them on fpsbanana and the zombiemod website.

Special thanks to:

Games - for testing and giving suggestions
Tyranastrasz - testing
